column2: BRIEF-Quanta Services Says CEO Earl Austin's FY 2019 Total Compensation Was $10.25 Mln vs $9.23 Mln In FY 2018 - SEC Filing April 17 (Reuters) - Quanta Services Inc: * QUANTA SERVICES INC SAYS CEO EARL AUSTINâ€™S FY 2019 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.25 MILLION VERSUS $9.23 MILLION IN FY 2018 - SEC FILING * QUANTA SERVICES INC SAYS FOR 2019, CEO PAY RATIO WAS 111 TO 1 Source : (bit.ly/3bm0k5G) Further company coverage:
